The Big Hitters - Dota 2

Message #1 le 2014-5-25 @ 22:28:05 par AncetoDX:

Hi there,

I represent The Big Hitters, a Dota 2 team from Winnipeg, MB.  I've emailed an administrator but thought it might be appropriate to post here as well.

The five of us have been playing Dota since it was a young Warcraft III custom map. Since, we've played avidly and been part of Dota 2 since the closed beta. We've just begun playing in skilled leagues, primarily JoinDota League.

In season 1 we went undefeated in our starter division, and now we are in America 3.1, tied for second to your current Dota 2 team, AG. (http://www.joindota.com/en/leagues/america/21-season-2/group/663-america-3-1)

Your organization caught our attention because Armata was an excellent team to play against, skilled and sportsmanlike, but also we want to become more involved in the semi-pro eSports scene in Canada.

Our lineup is as follows:
PiesDX - Core/Carry
BrickRoadDX - Support/Jungler
G$ - Core/Mid
AncetoDX - Core/Offlane
BigDonkeyDX - Support/Jungler

We're interested in becoming more active in more leagues and affiliating ourselves with an established eSports organization in order to foster our skills and increase our exposure.

So, that's the sum of it I think. Let us know if we might be candidates for your Dota 2 division.

Regards,

Glendon
